attributes.action: Introduce legislation making it a criminal offence for ministers to waste public money or mislead the public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ministers of the crown continue to be immune from prosecution if they flagrantly waste money from the public purse and also mislead the general public about any issue which they can hide behind public interest excuses. It is vital to this country that these practices stop and legislation is introduced to incarcerate ministers found misleading the public or wasting tax payers money.
